content.detailedDescription: While pulling up to a stop sign at moss mill & vienna ave i noticed in the sky in front of me what appeared to be a large craft moving slowly but some of which was obscured by a cloud. it appeared to be two shades of dark gray and black i would say circular in shape but i guess it was the bottom that i saw and it was not flat it had indentations. i turned down moss mill to get a better look but it was gone. i looked all over and wondered if i really saw what i thought i saw. i also thought to myself why arent i scared.
content.summary: Ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the night of the 23rd agoust 2009, we're on the beach of lido nazioni emilia romagna, italy, when i see 3 red/orange ligh crossing the sky quiete slowly. i think it was an airplane.
then this thing turn slightly on his left and i clearly see the his side. it was a dark flat trinagle with this 3 light under his extremity.
then this thing fly away in high speed.. it disappear.
it fly at short height

sorry for my english
thank you



era la sera del 23 agosto, non ho fatto caso all���ora esatta, in ogni caso fra le 23 e 00.30.
ho avvistato nel cielo sovrastante la spiaggia di lido nazioni tre luci arancio rossastre, muoversi con la velocit��� di un qualsiasi aereo, grazie ad un breve ralentamento e all���inclinazione presa dall���oggetto in favore di luce ho notato distintamenteuna la sua figura scura triangolare con le sopradescritte luci alle estremit���. dopodich��� l���oggetto ��� letteralmente schizzato via, scomparendo in un secondo si e no.
inizialmente ho pensato ad un aereo ma volava troppo basso e poi la velocit��� che ha preso non era certo da aereo di linea.

grazie
saluti a tutti!
content.summary: Dark tringle with 3 red/orange light - triangolo scuro con tre luci rosso/arancio

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation with a friend. we spent the day in the florida keys and while driving back to miami, somewhere in the middle of the everglades, we spotted ahead of us and off to the side of the highway a beam of sparkles (or 'glitter', as i just saw a lady on the discovery channel describe it as).  i have always recounted this event as calling them sparkles, as if they were sparklers from those stick sparklers that you lite and hold in your hand, or sometimes i have seen them in a birthday cake. 

 we saw this on the right side of the highway, approx. 100 yards from the highway. we had no idea at all what it is we were looking at, apart from it being sparkly things slowly falling from the sky in a similar fashion as snowflakes might fall from the clouds. we immediately pulled the car over and got out and watched. there were 2-3 other cars that also pulled over and had got out to watch. there was no sound at all coming from whatever was up above. there was nothing visible at all that would indicate where the beam of sparkles was emminating from, ie: a ufo craft of any sort. i estimate the beam of sparkles to be about 75-100 yards high. everyone that had pulled over and was standing beside there vehicles were all saying to each other, "what the heck is that??"  the sparkles seemed to almost be in a structured cylindrical 'beam' which i would guess to be about 15 feet in circumference. at first the beam was stationary, maybe for a minute or two, then it slowly started to drift towards the highway and behind our vehicle. it drifted for about 30 seconds with a full beam of sparkles still falling, at which point it crossed the highway. at one point the stream of sparkles seemed to be disrupted, as if the beam was momentarily broken, but within a few seconds it continued as a full beam again. we stood and watched it as it continued to slowly drift further away, pausing briefly once or twice, until either the beam vanished completely or had gone out of eye sight. the entire event took place over a period of 4- 5 minutes.  we stood there dumbfounded asking everyone what that was!  soon after we got back in our car and continued on to miami, all the while in amazement as to what we just witnessed and quizzing each other as to what it was we just saw.

the striking thing besides the sparkles was that there was no sound at all, none!

once back at our hotel, we questioned each other about whether that was something we should report to someone.  ultimately we did not report it.  i have told this story many times to people over the years, and am totally convinced that what we saw was something not of this world.

after watching the discovery program on tv tonight and hearing the lady on the show talk about the 'glitter' falling down and onto the tree in her backyard (then rising back up again), i knew she and i had witnessed the very same thing, (with the exception being that what i saw never rose back up into the sky).
content.summary: Driving from florida keys to miami, spotted sparkles falling from the sky

content.detailedDescription: My friend george was out behind the house as we were listening to the idiots blowing off fireworks when he came back in and asked if i saw the ufo. i was like what? so i went out to the front of the house and saw an orange ballish object going through the sky from the east heading west. i told george to grab my recorder and i shot as much of it as i could in a short period of time. it appeared to be somewhat round but yet somewhat oval or fireish. it traveled at a basic normal speed and did not appear to be to high in the sky, not more than a plane might be but did not have any flashing lights but did appear to be fluctuating to a point. it was deffinetly not a plane or jet, as ohare airport is the pattern it was coming from i questioned myself but knew it could not be a plane unless it was on fire. i watch a lot at night as they fly over daily or nightly as it were. the film i have just shows a white light in the night sky as it disappeared into the clouds. i am sure that enhansment would bring out the true color as we observerd that night. i resently called our county sheriff to see if there were any reports that night but only the usual illegal fireworks going on. the only thing i have is the shots i took and george as seeing them as well. but trust me, i gre w up in indiana as a kid and i can say, this isn't the first for me. i cant send photos as it is an old recorder that apparently itsn't compatable to my pc. but if i can figure out how to do i will or u may pick up thr tape. i have other things on it so i don't want to lose those.  the object we saw we observed for at least a 20 mile span or more or about.As the sky miles go anyway.
content.summary: Orange ovalish thing going east to west at a norming rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
i had just let the dog out in the back yard to do his bedtime business and also wanted to check the sky looking for the predicted cloud cover to move in,i had a fishing trip planned for (o dark 30)the next morning and needed to know weather to pack my rain outfit it looked to be clear,but i needed a better view because of the overhead awning. 
 the steps on my back yard deck face west and i walked towards them to check on the dog and get a better look at the sky. that's when an object caught my eye in the western sky about 30 degrees above the horizon. at first i thought it was a low a/c or maybe a helicopter because of the flashing red,green,and brite white lights. being a retired united airlines lead a&p tech. i always try to judge if an a/c is coming towards me or going away by which side the red or green nav. lights are on (port or starboard)l/h being port,r/h starboard. in this case they seemed to the naked eye to be  moving all over the place. i then went into the house and got my binoculars(10 x 50) and checked the object out again thru them,again they appeared to be all moving around,i needed a little more magnification to be able to make out what i was seeing so i went back in and got my 30x spotter scope with them i got a good look at what was going the red,green and white lights started moving into a vertical counter clock wise circle facing my direction around a very bright center white light, they were moving like a ferris wheel, then i knew it was no conventional a/c with nav. lights like that. they then went horizontal like the rings of the planet saturn then into a gyroscope configuration spinning and rotating. i watched the object for a good 20 min's. before it moved further of to the west and then it was gone.It did not appear to be more then 5 miles away, its hard to tell the altitude, about 30 degrees above the horizon, maybe 5000ft. i was not emotionally affected by seeing the object,more puzzled then anything.      
                            
                 regards , thom flynn
content.summary: Checking  sky for predicted overcast, it was clear as a bell. object appeared in the western sky about 30 deg. above the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Earlier this evening, i went out to the back deck around 6:35pm to start the bbq and took my binoculars with me to pass the time while cooking.  i was just going to look at the moon.  it was still fairly light out so i started to scan the sky and within a few minutes i spotted a good sized white sphere or orb in the southwestern sky looking towards the mountains.  it was not moving very much but was rather luminous and bright white as if lit from within.  i told my husband about it and he said it could be a weather balloon.  i have never seen a weather balloon but i thought they were usually grey or silver in color.  i watched the object for at least 6 to 8 minutes as some light clouds passed in front of it but i managed to keep sight of it. it was large enough that i could see it even without the aid of the binoculars.  it continued to move slowly towards the west and mountains staying bright white.  after about 10-12 minutes another group of clouds began to pass in front of it but i could still see it and then suddenly it just disappeared! in thin air it just disappeared.  if it was a balloon of some type - could it have just popped?  about 30 seconds later a commercial jet came from the east flying towards the west.  i continued to watch the sky for at least another 10 minutes but i never saw it again.
content.summary: Large white sphere luminous

content.detailedDescription:
Early june, 2009:
driving to lacey,nj, parkway southboud:

it was broad daylight. a perfectly round, red, orb. it looked to be the size of a volleyball or a basketball so i imagine it must have been slightly larger than that given optical illusion distance creates; it just sat perfectly still hovering there, smack dab in the middle of the road. it didn���t move or bounce or rotate. it didn���t ascend or descend at all��� as you would expect of a balloon. just sat there. couldn���t take my eyes off of it. it was just south of lakewood on the parkway southbound��� probably about 11 am.

someone had pulled over to watch. wish i could have done the same.
i was dumbfounded. i remember thinking to myself, ���what the hell is that��� as i approached. i tried to rationalize it away��� that it must have been one of the red cushions from an electrical wire��� but then i don���t know if those float. i assume that, had one of those broken loose, it would fall to the ground. and even then, if it was filled with some lightweight gas to support the weight of electric lines, i would expect it to be blown about by the currents of wind created by passing traffic. it didn���t ascend or descend. it was not attached to an electrical line. it just sat there. 

it was a very strange experience: its existence was telling me two contradictory things: ���here i am, look at me,��� but also ���you���re not supposed to see me, i���m supposed to look like something you don���t notice.��� 

it was almost like i wasn���t supposed to notice it was there, but yet, there it was in broad daylight, just sitting there seemingly watching traffic. very strange. 

it was very wierd. here were all these other people driving down the parkway, and only myself and one other person seemed to notice it at all. how? why?

it���s not the first time. other members of my family have seen similar things.
content.summary: Red orb less than 50ft off the ground: silent and still

content.detailedDescription: Me and my grandma were about to leave safeway when the object zoomed into view in front of my point of view. at that moment it seemed to move closer to us, but when we started to drive the object seemed to follow us. when we stopped, so would the object. during the experience the object appeared to be surrounded by a forcefield. the object appeared to be about a half mile away. at first i thought it was just another star in the sky. my reactions were same as most people: scared enough to be speechless. suddenly 8 minutes later, it vanished into thin air...
content.summary: Glowing bright white suspended high in the air

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out onto my deck about 8:45 p.M. on august 26th and looked into the  western sky as i very often do. i saw what i that was a star but is was larger, not quite as bright and just above the tree line. i thought , that is not right, there is no star supposed to be there. within a few seconds it moved across the skyline to the southeast and then went behind a tree line where i could not see it.  i see airplane���s all the time with their blinking lights approach the airport about 10 miles away and this was no plane. it moved a distance in a split second that i have watched a plane take several minutes to move the same distance.

i have been very nervous and kind feel like something or somebody was watching me. i don���t like this feeling.
content.summary: Bright light that moved at incrediblespeed

content.detailedDescription: I was monitoring the phoenix web-cam and noticed something strange. it was a wet night and thought water was on the lenses of the camera because there was a round orb in front of the camera, when the camera took another picture 15 minutes later the orb was closer! i captured that picture and 15 minutes later captured another picture and the orb was getting further away from the camera! it wasn't until i started looking at the picture i noticed two beings inside! you can clearly see one's shape of the head and his black eyes you have too look carefully at the picture to see it. i've tried to send it before but couldn't, i hope it comes through.
content.summary: Two aliens in sphere

content.detailedDescription: My parents lived on one of the flight paths between wright patterson afb and scott afb.  we were accustomed to seeing jets/carriers/helicopters of all sorts flying over.  always west to east or, east to west.  one day me and my mom were outside and an a-10 flew over heading due south.  then seconds later, 3 fighter jets in a trigangle formation chased after it.  we thought nothing of it at the time and assumed it was training.  that night everyone happened to be outside and a large, silent object flew over, very low, north to south.  it had no lights, no sound.  the only way we knew it was there was becasue it went under the stars and blocked them out.  it covered the aproximatly 5 miles of skyline we could see in about 3-4 seconds of time.  as soon as it was out of our view, 3 jets (again in a triangle formation) chased after it.  once they were out of sight nothing else happend.  the instant it happened, me and my mother looked at each other in surprise, because we had see almost the exact same thing earlier that day, but with an a-10 in the front.
content.summary: Dark, silent, fast object being chased by 3 jets.

content.detailedDescription:
I was real estate hunting in north las vegas and took this photo, i have been doing a lot of ufo reading, look above the tree, the location is two miles west of nellis afb. 

if you magnify it looks like an aluminum saucer, with a brown electrical or phase trail on the left. 

i was using a nikon digital dx40, i could not see the craft when i took the photo and noticed after downloading it to the computer.
content.summary: Took a picture of real estate and noticed an anomaly.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a parked car in a parking lot next to i-35 in moore oklahoma near 12th street and i noticed a bright kinda of glowing of pulsing ball in the sky zooming by like in less than 5 secs it crossed the whole sky and was gone i was amazed i thought it was a comet but then a few minutes later it came back and stopped right in straight view of the car as if it wanted me to see it and shoot up one time a few hundred feet then came back down it was crazy how fast it was then it just sat there in the sky glowing red and white the next thing i know i could tell it was watching me i had a extreme urge to talk out loud cuz i felt they would be able to hear me i said " i'm not afraid come closer" but nothing i still sensed that they heard me somehow like i was making eye contact with some one in the ship hundreds of yards away it eventually just zoomed away again.Then i was taking the trash to the curb and i felt that presence again but i couldnt see anything it was very strange.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A bright glowing pulsing orb

content.detailedDescription: My husband, myself, and my eleven year old son were stargazing tuesday the 25th of august 2009 at approx. 10:15 pm.  we were looking at jupiter in our south-east sky.  as my husband was repostioning his telescope after our viewing of the planet and i notice a large rectangulr object block out the starfield of the night sky.  as i focused my attention, i notice it made no sound, nor did it have any running lights on.  after several seconds, i asked my husband to look up from his telescope and acknowledge what i was seeing.  he did, and we watched until it left our field of vision.  the object was moving in a south east direction.  compared to an airplane the object was large, and it didn't look to be high in our atmosphere.  the reason why i hadn't reported the incident sooner was because i wanted to see if we had any satellite trajectories in our area that night.
content.summary: Large silent rectangular ufo dull in color without running lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was a summer night in 1979. my girlfriend and i were sitting on the balcony of her second-floor garden apartment in cranbury, nj, which overlooked a large open field, at the far edge of which was a wooded area, perhaps 150 yards or so away. it was late in the evening; perhaps around midnight or shortly thereafter. we were just hanging out, doing some stargazing.

then, i noticed something ���������funny��������� ��������� something odd going on in my peripheral vision that drew me to look over to the left portion of my field of vision. some of the ���������stars��������� were moving. perhaps 25 ��������� 30 degrees above the horizon, above the wooded area at the far left end of the field, was a loose cluster of perhaps 6 to 8 lights that were meandering about in the sky, randomly, aimlessly, independently of each other ��������� moving in something approximating ���������brownian motion.��������� they were a tad larger than the stars ��������� around the size of planets, and like the planets, they didn���������t twinkle; they shone with a bright, even, constant white light. but unlike planets, they were moving about ��������� meandering about, actually. i pointed this out to my girlfriend, and we both sat there watching this phenomenon for maybe 2 minutes, dumbfounded.

then, something even more curious happened. all of a sudden, the lights stopped meandering about, and collectively began migrating toward a central point. they settled into a perfectly circular formation, and remained motionless in this configuration for perhaps a minute or so. i counted 8 lights, and they were located at the 8 points of a compass in this motionless circular formation. again, the circular formation of lights was around 25 ��������� 30 degrees above the horizon, at the left side of the wooded area at the far end of the field. my girlfriend and i just sat there, awestruck at what we were looking at. 

then, something stunning happened. suddenly, in an instant, all 8 of these lights suddenly took off radially, away from the center, away from each other, like spokes of a wheel, and shot over the entire distance from the original formation to the distant horizons in probably one second or less, and disappeared from view. they didn���������t accelerate ��������� they went from 0 to probably thousands of miles per hour instantaneously. this absolutely terrified both my girlfriend and me. we jumped up, said something like ���������oh, [cms/tg/pd]��������� or ���������oh, my god!��������� and ran into the apartment and locked the patio door. for maybe a half an hour, all we could do was jump around and yell ���������oh my god, what the hell was that??!!!���������

that is when i knew ��������� absolutely ��������� that we are not alone.
content.summary: Ufo sighting - 1979 - cranbury, nj - circular formation

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing this on behalf of my mum who i am going to get her to redo this report with sketches.

my mum was about 10, it was her sisters birthday and everyone was inside when her brother and friend called them all outside (it was daytime). everyone thought it was just some cool car or something so they went outside and saw 7 black disk shape objects 3 on each side and one in the middle and they were a bit higher than tree hight and had lights around them. my mum said they were like the ufos you see in the movies. everyone was silent and was watching these things in shock. it happened for a fare few minutes, people were stopping their cars and getting out of their cars and my mum said about 40 people were watching these things. my mums sister called the air control place to ask if they had a air show on or something but they said no.  while they were watching it the middle disk  let out a lightish blue colour beam close to a old swim bath place for a few moments before disappearing. thanks, and i will get my mum to do a report and sketck herself.
content.summary: 7 disk shaped ufos , one lets out blue beam.

content.detailedDescription:
Woke at approximately 11 pm to see room was filled with orange/yellow light. thinking it was a fire outside i looked out the window and saw a yellow disk approximately 50 feet long and 15 feet high at the thickest point. it was the color of steel in a furnace and glowed in a similar manner. 

it was approximately 100 to 120 feet away and traveling at approximately 50 feet above the ground and flying slowly to the south. lost sight of it after about 20 to 30 seconds.

this occured in the newport subdivision in crosby texas.
content.summary: Glowing yellow disk treetop level slowly flies south

content.detailedDescription: Friday aug 21 my daughter and i were at worlds of fun on the ferris wheel. we were sitting at the top while people below were loading. i was looking to my left at people on another ride when my 5 yr old daughter kept pulling at my arm telling me to "look at the shooting star". when i finally looked to my right i saw what looked like a shooting star or meteor entering the atmosphere. i saw one very bright light and then suddenly there were 3 more lights under the bright light. they didn't seem to move and seemed very still. i then reached for my camera phone and took several pictures which i currently have on my phone. the ferris wheel circled approx 3 times and i took pictures each round until the ride was over. i lost track of the lights after exiting the ride.
content.summary: 4 lights above kansas city hovering.  8/21 approx 9pm

content.detailedDescription: Just before 1940hrs i went outside my condo to see if our hottest day of the year had started to cool. in the same location as i reported a sighting on 7/15/09 i spotted what i thought was a satellite traveling from se to nw high in the evening sky. it was still light enough that i could not see any stars at that time. as i watched it slowly move, it suddenly turned to the west and increased acceleration until it disappeared. i continued looking at the sky and within the next five minutes two f-18s from miramar flew overhead about 30 - 45 seconds apart at an estimated altitude of 1.0 to 1.5k feet heading out to the east desert training area. very loud! i continued to sky-watch and about 5 minutes later i spotted a similar satellite object flying from e to w at a very slow speed. after it moved about three fists at arms length distance, the object hovered and then moved in an irregular circle for at least a minute. it suddenly disappeared and i did not see it again. it's a question if this was the same object being seen twice or two different objects. no way to tell.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-like objects (2) between 1940 and 1955hrs

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime after midnight on the 27th of august, 2009 i went outside on the patio to have a cigarette.  i am not sure of the exact time, but i estimate that it was around 12:30 to 1:00 am.  i noticed 2 red lights in the sky southeast of north rt 48. their brightness and size caught my attention. at first i thought it was an airplane, but i wondered why the fiery red lights on an aircraft. they appeared to be throwing off sparks; but much too large to be fireworks, and sort of "hanging" in the same location.  no movement except flickering.

 the lights then separated somewhat, a larger one on top and the smaller one on bottom, and i realized this was not an airplane.  the lower light then fizzled out and disappeared.  in a second the larger light went out.  there was no trail, no "shooting star" characteristics.  this was only around 1-2 minutes at the most. i have seen "shooting stars" but this was nothing like that.  they fizzled out without moving in any direction, just separated. i waited to see if this would reappear.  i thought it may have gone behind a cloud or something, but that was it. i was baffled as to what i had seen.
content.summary: Red lights in sky near lebanon, ohio

content.detailedDescription:
Saw my first ufo last night (this last morning), probably an iridium satellite, at about 5 am mdt, looking east from santa fe forest, forest road 289 (just after band.) at a cluster of stars that look like a comet to the naked eye, so i was checking  with binoculars and bingo on the "second" check (for some reason i looked again and while marveling off and on comet/cluster) a ufo crossed. mostly no trail but some times had a one, so i'm think ufo.

e-mailed to george noory and linda for tonight's show on coast to coast.

i was out making a quick camp fire since it was cold (built the prior evening, all i did was start it).
content.summary: Ufo dome (flat on bottom, circle on top); little bigger than stars in cluster in binoculars 8x

content.detailedDescription:
I was at six flags amusement park in jackson, nj 08527 on 8/27/2009. we were waiting on line for the kingda ka roller coaster when people all around us started looking up into the clouds at a perfect circular object with a black edge moving slowly in and out of the clouds but on a steady plane near the bottom of the heavy cloud cover. it went in and out but you could always see the black edge of the circle as it moved thru the clouds moving against the wind and clouds toward us and then passing near us everybody there was yelling ufo it could have been a hundred people that saw it.

it was a perfect circle moving slowly against the wind for a half hour or more.

send me an email if you get other reports of this event.

thanks
content.summary: A lot of people saw a perfect 360 degree circle with a black edge defining the shape moving slowly thru the clouds at six flags amusement park, jackson, nj 08527.

content.detailedDescription:
I and my family were in our rest home when we saw the ufo. we were preparing the lunch on the free air when happened this. firstly i did was to take photos with my cellphone.

1. i was in my rest home and i was looking the birds on the tree and drink juice.
2. i was scary and surprised.
3. i thought that i need proofs for show after
4. the ufo moved around the sun
5. i felt nothing specially but my main reaction was to take photos
6. i spoke with my family about happenened and saved the photos in my laptop.
content.summary: I was resting in my home when i saw a light in the sky like saturn planet so i took three photos with my cellpphone

content.detailedDescription:
I was going through my photos and found this object in the middle picture of three shot on auto focus in 2.3 seconds. 

i was shooting a helicopter and caught something very odd in the middle photo. it is metallic looking on top shaded below and is moving very fast. 

i have no idea of what i caught. thought you might like to see the three photos and judge for yourselves if it is or is not.

it is a puzzler for sure as the object had to be moving very fast 

it was my dad and myself and we where celebrating fathers day with a fishing trip to a high country styream on the east end of grand mesa.
content.summary: Object on photo that was not seen

content.detailedDescription: I saw a huge, completely black rectangular object come from the hills.  it was about 200-300 feet off the ground and flew directly over my house.  i called my fiance out to verify i wasn't seeing things.  i was in a state of panick, my fiance was hypntotized by the object. as i saw it fly over my house, i noticed it had rings on the bottom of it, they appeared red in color.  it looked like a spaceship, and dull gray in color, like a warship.  nohing like the ufo's you normally see.  it continued to fly past my house, and in a bright flash of light dissapeared from sight.  from the other reports, it sounds as if it was making a travel from one airbase, to another, as i live close to edwards airforce base.  just thought i would share what i had seen..
content.summary: Huge airship rectangular, similiar to san diego sightings

content.detailedDescription: My family were enjoying some time near a school playground. we decided to walk to another section of the school playground and i lagged behind a little. i noticed a cone shaped craft in the air moving slowly just northwest of our given location. the object was silver/white in color and produced a very bright glare at times when gazing upon it.No sound could be heared. i watched the craft for approx 40 second until craft proceeded upward into cloud cover. we stayed at the playground for another 20 minutes or so. the object was not seen again.
content.summary: Silver/white cylinder object flying at slow speed(no sound) for approx 40 sec then proceeded into cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: The interesting thing about this for me - is that i was with someone else that i don't know very well at the time of this occurrence. they saw these starlike objects first and then pointed them out to me. this happened at about 8:30am looking west over the olympic mountains from the shoreline area. it was a very clear day not a cloud in the sky, the sky was a light bright blue.  i would estimate these star-like objects to be appox. 35,000 feet and literally skipping like stones skip on water, then they would change directions, loop around each other and then straighten out into what appeared to be a straight line but, slightly off-set from each other, there were 3 of them - at times the last one would skip ahead to the first position and then the second would skip ahead of position 1 and so on... it was like they were playing leap frog.  both myself and this other person just stood there and watched them for several minutes - sometimes we'd both lose site of them and then regain visuals on them - these objects were faster than our eyes could follow at times - almost appearing to blink off and then reappear several thousand feet away - but still moving in a grouping.  they moved from north to south either above the puget sound or the olympic mountain range.. eventually we both lost visual contact with the skipping star like objects- it was pretty amazing.  i just read another washington report of similar objects over the cascades and wanted to share my experience. sorry no photo and honestly would not have shown up anyway- too high, too fast
content.summary: Skipping starlike objects

content.detailedDescription: We were almost afraid to report this since we just did yesterday another incidence. thought you might think we were acouple of kooks. but like i said we saw 2 round star like shapes flying high up in the stars side by side coming from the southwest and turning towards the east. thats when we noticed a 3rd one following behind about 10 feet behind kind of between then only behind them. they were moving fairly fast and we watched then for about 8 to 10 minutes untill we  could'nt see them any more. but we did noticed the 3rd on sort of caught up with the other two before dissapearing towards the casecade mts. we have nothing to gain from telling you this but wanted to let you know that we have seen acouple of others things happen over the months. if you want to know about those also we would gladley tell you. but we think it's awfully weird that these things have been happening around here. why here? we are always outside in the middle of the night because we wake up early and can't go back to sleep so we just get up and go outside with a ciggarete and watch the stars. we feel very weird to have seen so many things in our area. that's why we really didn't want to report them but my husband said we should so maybe you could research the night sky that night and maybe have a logical explination. i don't know what else to tell you but we did see this.
content.summary: Saw 2 star like objects flying high side by side then noticed a 3rd one flying about 10 feet behind them but in the middle of them in the back came from southwest and turned towards the east towards the casecade mts.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette and looking at the stars when i noticed a star flashing very fast and seemed to be changing colors. i went inside to get my binoculars for a clearer look because the object was very far to the south. it seemed to be flashing white, then red, then a blueish green. i then called my wife and son out to also have a look. they both saw it. we then began to look around and counted eight total in different distances and positions, all in the souther sky. we could not find anything even similar in any area of the sky except the south. they did not move for the hour or so that we watched them. we then went inside and our direct tv flashed and lost it's signal very briefly. unknown if this had anything to do with what we saw other than our dish points to the south.
content.summary: Seen a light very far to the south that was flashing very fast and not moving

content.detailedDescription: I saw it pulsing and flashing multiple colors with red lighening looking rays coming off of it ...Its still there south east arvada
content.summary: I saw it pulsing and flashing multiple colors
